verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] tried to blame Democrats , who hold no levers of power in the government today , for a situation that has sparked fury and a national debate over the moral implications of his hard - line approach to immigration enforcement .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: tried] [ARG1: to blame Democrats , who hold no levers of power in the government today , for a situation that has sparked fury and a national debate over the moral implications of his hard - line approach to immigration enforcement] .

President Donald Trump has tried to blame [ARG0: Democrats] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: hold] [ARG1: no levers of power] [ARGM-LOC: in the government] [ARGM-TMP: today] , for a situation that has sparked fury and a national debate over the moral implications of his hard - line approach to immigration enforcement .
